sentence.Network_en: I shall probably oversleep as I am not used to getting up so early.
sentence.Network_cn: 我很可能会睡过头,因为我不习惯这么早起.

sentence.Network_en: If you set your alarm clock, you won't oversleep.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你上闹钟, 你就不会睡过头了.

list.abs: 睡过头并不是上学迟到的正当理由。 6. I never oversleep.  我从不睡过头的。 7. But sometimes I overslept.  但有时候我会睡过头。 8. I never used.

entry.def: If you oversleep, you sleep longer than you should have done.

example.ex: I'm really sorry I'm late, Andrew. I forgot to set my alarm and I overslept.
example.tran: 安德鲁，很抱歉我迟到了。我忘了设闹钟，结果睡过头了。

auth_sentence.content: Rather, they often oversleep, overeat, and feel irritable and aggressive.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rather, they often oversleep, overeat, and feel irritable and aggressive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rather, they often oversleep, overeat, and feel irritable and aggressive.

sentences.en: I shall probably oversleep as I am not used to getting up so early.
sentences.cn: 我很可能会睡过头,因为我不习惯这么早起。
